choiceresponse.label: Let's make sure you've completed all the CC tasks presented in this unit.

checkboxgroup.choice: I've signed the Core Contributor Program Agreement
I've said hi in #core-contributors in Slack
I've made sure my information is accurate on the Core Contributor wiki page
I've made an account on the Open edX forums so I can participate in and be tagged in sprint retrospectives

I can access Listaflow (sprint retrospective tool) - Note: you will receive access to Listaflow about a week after your Program Agreement is signed by both you and Axim. If you don't have access at that point, please comment on your onboarding ticket that you created on GitHub.
I have added the Working Groups calendar to my calendar, and I know when the biweekly Contributor's Discussion is.
